name: CurseOfCourses
description:
Controls:
Run - A/D

Jump - Space

Open/Close minimap - M

-----------

A world in which there are 2 classes of mages - the more agile and the stronger in magic.

The class stronger in magic sends you to an artificially created world in order to teach you magic and dexterity at the same time, but something went wrong... evil got into this world...
